transcript:
Customer: Haan.

Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, Gagan ji namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar Bade bhai. Kaise ho?
Executive: Theek hu mai aap batao. System pe aa gaye?
Customer: Haan aa gaya hu. Kab aaye hai aap gaon se?
Executive: Aa gaya tha mai 30 31 tak aa gaya tha mai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Yaar leads nahi aa rahi hai aap thoda kuch dekho yaar.
Executive: Kya lead mein problem hai? By leads mein aapka call karwaaya tha mai aapka FMU jo football star prone A to Z construction ki aayi hai. Tiruvananthapuram, Kerala se.
Customer: Kya hai leads ye?
Executive: Ye bataata hu mai MUD foot football turf ground A to Z construction. 33 minute pehle aayi hai.
Customer: Ye nahi karte hum log.
Executive: To ek baar mark ke liye aur vinil green inilo sports court mat flooring aayi thi. 5 minute pehle.
Customer: Ye bhi nahi karte hum log.
Executive: To isko ek baar irrelevant mark kar do by lead ko ek baar.
Customer: Kya karna hai bataiye?
Executive: Jo by lead irrelevant lag rahi hai na usme dekhiye waha pe dustbin ka icon aa raha.
Customer: Nahi irrelevant mein mujhe kya karna hai? Jo aa raha dustbin usme daal de?
Executive: Haan haan jo not irrelevant hai na irrelevant aapki nahi hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To usko not irrelevant mark kar do. I do not business case hai na. Haan ji. Kar diya. Jo irrelevant aa rahi hai.
Customer: Kar diya. Ab baaki ek baar category vagaira bhi check aapka to maine kar liya tha. Ek hi mane bahut saari by lead irrelevant aa rahi hai kya product related nahi hai?
Customer: Dekhiye bilkul.
Executive: Ek taraf football court artificial turf karke hai Dibrugarh Assam se.
Customer: Kaunsa bolna hai?
Executive: 33 ghante isko ho gaya already. Niche scroll karo na aap ek baar.
Customer: Kis date mein dikha raha hai ye?
Executive: 33 ghante 33 ghante isko ho gaya 10 square feet quantity dala hai. Dikh raha aapko ye by lead?
Customer: 10 square feet mein kaun karta hai bataiye?
Executive: Detail hai ye. Ek baar bulk ka filter laga lo aap.
Customer: Ye ye 10 wale mein kaun karta hai?
Executive: 3500 square feet chalega? 3500 square feet 3500 square feet. Pehle dekhiye hum hum teen chaar hi product mein karte hai to basketball pole hai.
Customer: Ji ji haan wo to main aapka. Sports sports flooring mein PPT tile hai aur synthetic hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Aur football hockey ye ho gaya. To baaki ye sab anavashyak leads aa rahe hai.
Customer: Aur hamare irrelevant koi bahut zyada leads nahi aa rahe hai. Hum maan lijiye prefr star hai.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji haan ji sir. To aapka idhar hamare pure India level pe humko aana chahiye leads aa hi nahi raha. Ab aap dekho per day ka hamara kitna leads aa raha hai. Aur leads aise aa rahe hai jaise light aayi aur bhag gayi. Matlab aadmi usko buy kare usse pehle wo
Customer: Out.
Executive: Dekhiye. To wo by lead maanta hu jaise ye football wali by lead ek baar past by list pe aana sir ek baar Gagan ji.
Customer: Kya bolna?
Executive: Ek baar past by list pe aana.
Customer: Kya bol rahe hai?
Executive: Past leads pe past leads pe aana ek baar.
Customer: Past leads pe chaliye mai aa gaya.
Executive: Haan ek baar dekho to isme jo by lead sold out hui hai. Usko dekho aur aap I am interested us by lead mein kar do jo aapke relevant hai jo yaha pe aapko sold out by lead dikh jayegi jo matlab. Mai karta hu jo jo hamare relevant hote hai mai usko karta hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Hmm. Isme kul wo nahi hai basketball flooring hai isko mai interested karta hu lekin aise aati hai na aapko mai kaise batau. Matlab wo usko time nahi lagta aane mein aur jaane mein.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Hmm. Dekhiye hota kya hai aapke paas sahi ki within a second kyuki kuch by lead highly sold category ki hamari hoti hai na IndiaMART mein. Wo maanta hu by lead highly sold out bahut jaldi within a second notification mein aap phone pe zyada karte ho ki laptop zyada access karte ho. Matlab zyada.
Customer: Dono.
Executive: Dono hai na. Aap ek kaam karna. Office time laptop pe chalta hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aur aise mobile hai.
Executive: Ji. Aap ek kaam karna iske liye kya karna na jo by lead jo notification notification ek baar off karke on kar lena ek baar aap. Ek baar setting pe aana.
Customer: Aur notification jo hai na aapka ek baar off karke ek baar on karna refreshment ke liye ek baar.
Customer: Kis mein karu mai? Mobile mein karu ya system pe kar du?
Executive: System jispe follow karo system mein to follow aasan rahega thoda sa. Notification alert mein aana hai. Haan haan usko ek baar off karke na ek baar on kar lena. Aur office hour non office hour. Ye kaha hai notification kaha dikhata hai?
Executive: Setting mein aao ek baar. Laptop pe ho na?
Customer: Haan. Setting mein aaiye aap. Notification. Haan wahi pe aapko saara mil jayega.
Executive: Ek baar jo tick laga ho na usko ek baar karke ek baar off off off. Bahut saare bahut zyada tick laga hai.
Executive: Haan usko ek baar kar ke na fir se tick off karke tick on kar lijiye ek baar. Matlab bahut saare tick hai ek to hai hi nahi.
Executive: Saara matlab on hai matlab email pe bhi hai SMS pe bhi hai app pe bhi hai. Aap PNS call setting wale pe aana.
Customer: Kis pe?
Executive: PNS call setting mein aana. Isme teen jagah tick hai.
Executive: PNS call setting notification setting hai seedhe PNS call setting hai.
Customer: PNS call hai. Theek hai. Uspe aao ek baar office hour non dono ko na off karke ek baar on karo aap.
Customer: To teeno to tick hai teeno ka un tick. Haan nahi ek baar kar ke haan ek baar band kar ke ek baar on karo aap.
Customer: OTP maang raha hai.
Executive: OTP to nahi aayega.
Customer: OTP aa raha hai.
Executive: By leads. Na na na aap setting setting mein aap setting mein jaate hai na PNS call setting.
Customer: PNS call setting pe aane ke baad teen option dikha raha hai SMS.
Executive: Ek minute ruko aap mai ek baar video meet pe connect karu aapke saath hai possible abhi time ho to. Aaiye video call hi kar lijiye. Mai ek baar ruko aapke saath video meet pe connect kar leta hu ek baar.

Executive: Kaha pe dikkat ho rahi hai na mai kar deta hu aapko. Prime.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are not relevant.

- Leads are not coming as expected.



Resolution:

- Asked to mark irrelevant buyleads.

- Asked to turn off and on notifications.

- Executive offered to connect via video meet.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect via video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, notifications, irrelevant leads
